summary: Defines Metaflow deployment objects for Argo Workflows, including representations of a deployed workflow template and a triggered run, with capabilities to fetch configuration, obtain authentication tokens, start executions, manage run state, and delete templates. Also provides a utility to create placeholder flow file contents.
business_intent: Enable seamless integration of Metaflow pipelines with Argo Workflows on Kubernetes, allowing users to deploy flows as reusable templates, trigger and control executions programmatically, and handle lifecycle operations such as monitoring and cleanup.
